document_data.mainbody: '''Rum''' was a variety of fragrant distilled alcohol most famously associated with the pirates of the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]], thanks to it being a very common type of drink carried aboard.
document_data.Availability:
The fortified town and the isle of [[Skaug]] in the [[Nelanther Isles]] was known as a major producer of rum. Another producer of rum was [[One-Eyed Jax]] in [[Luskan]] on the [[Sword Coast North]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

Rum was on offer at [[The Happy Stein]] and [[Skully's Bar and Bait]] dockside tavern in the city of the [[Ravens Bluff]]

Throughout [[Faer√ªn]], rum was used to flavor and moisten [[fruitcake]]s, including those sold through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''. Aurora's [[gingerbread]] was also sold with rum sauce. [[Black forest cake]] decorated with rum-soaked [[cherries]] was one of the pastries on the [[Downunda Patisserie]]'s menu in Ravens Bluff.{{Cite organized play/LC/Aethalynmur's Wings|3}}

Rum was found only on the surface of [[Toril]], making it a valuable export into the [[Underdark]] and the [[drow]] city of [[Menzoberranzan]]. Similarly, in [[Maztica]], rum was rare and found in [[Ulatos]], from where it was sold to the towns of [[Tezat]] and [[Azatl]] at the dockside drinking establishments.
document_data.Notable Rums:
*[[BG Rum]], a harsh concoction from the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], popular among the sailors of the [[Sea of Swords]].
*[[Calishite rum]], a popular rum exported out of Calimshan and imported into the [[Moonshae Isles]].
*[[Chultan Fireswill]], a heavily-[[spice]]d variety with potent smell and fiery taste, produced in [[Chult]].
*[[Grog]], a type of watered down rum often sold for cheap.
*[[Radagan's Red Rum]], a variety of expensive and rare drink found behind the bar at the [[Yawning Portal]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.{{Cite adventurers league/Last Orders at the Yawning Portal|63}}
*[[Red-dog rum]], a cheap and unpalatable rum from [[Lathtarl's Lantern]].{{Cite dungeon/64/Grotto of the Queen|15-16}}
*[[Rolling Deck Rum]], a variety of blended sweet rum popular among the sailors.
*[[Whalebone Spiced]], a popular amber-colored alcohol in the city of [[Waterdeep]].
*[[Yggdrasil Garden Rum]], a rare variety of rum procured off-world and smuggled onto Toril via [[wildspace]].
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Murphy Ironfist]], an adventuring [[dwarf|dwarvish]] [[priest]] of [[Moradin]] from [[Amn]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century DR.
*[[Silas Windspray]], the captain of the ''[[Windspray]]'' of Ravens Bluff stocked his ship with rum in the late 14{{th}} century DR.{{Cite organized play/LC/A Spell of Bad Weather|7}}
